headline.main: ROOSEVELT URGES NEW LAW IN WORLD; Letter to American Society Says International Problems Will Not 'Adjust Themselves' SAYRE CALLS FOR FORCE He and Coudert Assert Moral Suasion Has Failed to Curb Breakers of Treaties

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 30 -- President Roosevelt assured the American Society of International Law tonight that nations of the globe must unite in a definite body of law to preserve civilization and prevent "a recurrence of the present reign of lawlessness."
abstract: S on post-war world, Amer Soc of Internatl Law
